overview: Dante Martin and Cameron Cyle cozy up at home and make each other sizzle on a cold winter's day. Straight dude Miles Taylor betrays his weakness for big cock when Seamus O'Reilly comes by with the necessary equipment. When Chris Blades hangs out in Vegas with his old buddy Bridger Watts the two guys can't help but rehash their past affair. Bratty Dakota Young sneaks into Dalton Riley's house when he doesn't respond to his message on the dating site.
title: Taking It Raw!
